desc: An online pet store for Veterans and their supporters, with premium and natural brands at competitive prices, & free shipping. Rook’s is donating ALL profits this month to Sierra Delta in support of the Life Buddy Program and is committed to developing new ways for pet parents to enjoy their life with their best buds.

layout.text: Special Pricing, Free Shipping, and Exclusive Deals for Veterans through the Life Buddy Program
Join Rook’s Community, Empower Veterans and Their Dogs Every Time You Shop
